DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Efficacy Rapydan Versus Tetracaine Gel
DOC.detailed_description: Tetracaine gel 4 % topical anaesthetic gel commonly use UK contain 40 mg tetracaine base per gram . Adequate anaesthesia usually achieve follow 30 minute application time venopuncture 45 minute application time venous cannulation . The hypothesis Rapydan medicate plaster effective tetracaine gel prevent venous cannulation relate pain apply recommend treatment duration 30 minute 45 minute respectively . This study withdraw additional data available .
